features: Slim and Stable Bulid: JOYACCESS wireless keyboard and mouse features a scissor-cross low profile layout. 15° tilt design numpad keyboard, increases the comfort of use and helps reduce stress. The keycaps are thin and flat, silver-white color keyboard mouse wireless with curved shape,saving office desktop space.

Easy to Set up to Your Device:Computer keyboard and mouse combo can be stably and easily connected within 10m.,which commonly use one nano receiver to connect with your computer. It doesn't need install any drivers, practical and user-friendly, plug and play. The nano receiver just snap in the storage of mouse near battery compartment.

Less Noise and Hign Precise: The keyboard's noise reduced keys and the silent click of the quiet mice will allow you to do your job without missing a sound or disturbing your environment.You can easily change the cursor sensitivity of this cordless mouse depending on your needs.usually 1600 DPI for office, DPI 2000-2400 for 4K resolution monitor or entertainment like gaming at home.

Battery Saving: Wireless mouse will automatically sleep in power saving mode while not in use for about 20 seconds, and the compact wirless keyboard also come into sleep in 8 minutes if no typing. Keyboard mouse combo can be reactivated in milliseconds by clicking any key. batteries not included in package.

Wide Compatibility: JOYACCESS Keyboard mouse set is compatible with Windows 2000 / ME / XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 12. Work well with Macbook, desktops, Chrome-book, PC, Laptop, Computer Smart TV and more. Both keyboard and mouse give a world of silence and a morden desktop; great for conference, board presentation, library, coffee shop, night work, travel, etc.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 23,061 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silent and neat looking keyboard and mouse
reviews.reviewText: Keyboard and mouse looks and works great, both keyboard and mouse is silent on key presses and clicks.Comes with usb nano receiver and easy to connect (however I don’t think it can be paired directly with bluetooth)You’ll need 3 AA batteries, 1 for the mouse and 2 for the keyboard.This is a full size wireless keyboard with 102 keys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality keyboard and mouse at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: I work remotely, and this is the second set of keyboard and mouse I purchased. It's a great combination of style and practicality. The appearance is very sleek — it's a perfect blend of modern design and functionality. I also like that the keys on the keyboard are fairly quiet. The mouse is equally nice, as it fits comfortably in hand, and the clicking noise is minimal, which is great for maintaining a peaceful environment during late-night work sessions. Totally recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I especially like the keys and the visibility of this keyboard.
reviews.reviewText: 0614-2022 Update: There is an idiosyncrasy with the keyboard in which, after a period of non-use, the keyboard does not respond to the first key depression. This is problematic in that the typist has to first discover the mishap and then go back and place the missing typed character. Not good! Almost a strikeout blow for the keyboard but not quite.Original Review:With the exceptions listed below, the JOYACCESS 2.4GB wireless keyboard compares favorably with better known brands, I think.First impressions are that its positives include excellent basic keyboard functionality, a keyboard footprint that is small compared to others I have used, which means more room for palm/wrist support if desired. I also like the improved visibility of the keys & their labels. LEDs intermittently let me know the status of Num and Caps locks. A third LED is labeled ‘Power Indicator’ but indicates nothing since it never comes on. Anyway, I am not sure of since included documentation fails to mention ‘Power Indicator’.After first impressions, there is the all-important keyboard functionality that counts a lot with me. Keys design is of high quality, I think. This keyboard gives a good tactile feel that suggests good design and engineering and construction. Typing is quiet, and each key strike instantly produces an accurate result on the screen.I see are three negatives so far:1) The ‘manual’ is lacking. The Amazon description of the product offers more information about the product than does the so-called included manual, e.g., The Amazon product description shows the ‘Power Indicator’ in an image callout but otherwise does not mention it.2) The provided user manual never mentions ‘Power Indicator’, let alone explain its purpose or functionality. The LED Power Indicator on my JOYACCESS combo NEVER comes on—even for a short blink or flash, even during or after bootup, even during shutdown. So, the lack of illumination may be a defect. If it is a defect, it is one that I can tolerate because all in all I am pleased with this peripheral set and don’t see the value of a power indicator on a battery-operated device. I am using the JOYACCESS keyboard and mouse peripherals on a Windows 10 desktop 64-bit PC.3) Customer service is China-based and unfortunately nonsensical. If you have the unpleasant experience of visiting this poorly designed website, you will soon exit in frustration. Popups that get in the way and can’t be moved or closed, prompts for your name when you have already typed in your name, poorly chosen English words that do not apply, etc.My sense is that the JOYACCESS combo discussed here is worth the price because it is essentially a quality product that works well. I especially like the keys and the visibility of this keyboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The keyboard is as described.
reviews.reviewText: I returned the keyboard because the keys were too spongy for me. But the keyboard is good. Well build, sturdy, heavy. The keys are very soft as the seller describes but they were just too spongy for me. They could be perfect for someone else. The key mechanisms are quiet. The seller was great to work with, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing until mouse stopped working EDIT: great customer service!
reviews.reviewText: Had this set since earlier this month and loved it so much until yesterday when the mouse stopped working. I have tried to replace the batteries but it no longer turns on.EDIT: seller reached out after this review and offered full refund for the product. Very happy with how the seller handled this and will be buying product again because I really did love it while it worked!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good, cheap, and aesthetically pleasing...but the mouse is awful.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this keyboard + mouse pairing for work, and it's worked well overall.It's very aesthetically pleasing, especially since I bought more green paraphernalia to complement it.Both the keyboard and mouse connect via the USB receiver (NOT USB-C). If you're using a MacBook or device with only USB-C ports, don't forget to grab an adapter.Biggest problem for me is that the mouse tracking is awful. Sometimes it will be fine, and then will intermittently give up and require tremendous pressure or shaking just to start tracking again (even with a mousepad) Even when working well, there is still a perceivable lag to the cursor.Keyboard is good overall - if I could pay $20 just for the keyboard and skip the mouse, I would

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard is so pretty! It took 2 seconds to hook up and the keyboard and mouse worked right away!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient size, works great, average durability
reviews.reviewText: I love the full but compact keyboard. I need the 10-key numbers for work, but I need it to fit in the bag I take to work. It's perfect. The mouse is perfectly comfortable for me.Some reviews mention weird glitches and wrong letters appearing. Replace the batteries. The keyboard does surprisingly weird stuff on low batteries, but it goes away with fresh ones.The durability isn't great. I work in a car with a laptop stand, much like a police car. I carry the keyboard and mouse in a small duffel bag called a 'patrol bag.' If you're rough with it, the battery doors fall off, and it's easy to lose keys. I lost two keys up in the corner, but they still work when you press them, and anyway, they were weird function keys I didn't use. You can't push the keys back on after they break off, it doesn't work that way. Don't throw it around or slide the key side against things.

El teclado no es del todo silencioso, tenía con él apenas unos meses y dejó de funcionar bien, empezó a tener delay y a duplicar y sobreescribir letras aunque se presionara solo una vez la tecla. no lo volvería a comprar.

I recently purchased the Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo from J JOYACCESS and I am extremely pleased with my purchase. This combo offers a sleek and stylish design, along with a range of convenient features that enhance my productivity and comfort.The slim and portable design of both the keyboard and mouse is a major highlight. The keyboard is full-sized, providing a comfortable typing experience, yet it is lightweight and easy to carry around. The mouse also fits perfectly in my hand and is responsive and accurate.The wireless connectivity of this combo is excellent. The 2.4G technology ensures a stable and reliable connection, without any lag or interruptions. I appreciate the convenience of not having to deal with tangled wires on my desk. The range is also impressive, allowing me to use the keyboard and mouse from a distance without any signal loss.The ergonomic design of both the keyboard and mouse is a major plus. The keyboard features a slight tilt and low-profile keys, which promotes a more natural typing position and reduces strain on my wrists. The mouse is also designed to fit comfortably in my hand, reducing any discomfort during extended use.Another feature of this combo is the extreme power-saving capabilities. Both the keyboard and mouse automatically go into sleep mode when not in use, which helps conserve battery life. The batteries themselves have a long lifespan, further extending the usage time.The 2400 DPI optical tracking on the mouse is highly responsive and accurate, allowing for smooth and precise cursor movements. This is particularly useful for tasks that require precision, such as graphic design or gaming.Overall, I highly recommend the Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo from J JOYACCESS. The sleek design, ergonomic features, wireless connectivity, and power-saving capabilities make it a fantastic choice for both work and leisure. Whether you need a reliable keyboard for typing or a responsive mouse for navigating, this combo has you covered.

excelente calidad y diseño muy bonito, el color es rose gold tal cual dice la descripcion, las teclas son suaves y poco ruidosas, el único detalle es que no tiene patitas para levantarse de ahí en fuera todo genial. el mouse esta perfecto no hace ruido y es muy suave. lo recomiendo 10/10.

The media could not be loaded. Es perfectamente hermoso, silencioso, tanto el teclado como el mouse son perfectos, el color es lindísimo.Dudé en pedirlo porque no tenía comentarios previos pero vale totalmente la pena, no trae la letra Ñ pero no es problema, lo puedes configurar en español desde la Computadora, para mí no es problema ya que no veo el teclado cuando escribo así que ya me acostumbré. Es una gran opción y yo estoy fascinada con mi compra.

reviews.reviewTitle: Hermoso diseño y muy duradero ya tengo un año con el.
reviews.reviewText: Excelente producto, material y el color esta padrísimo; sin embargo no me percaté que el teclado es estilo estadounidense y hasta la fecha no me acomodó como sacar los símbolos y acentos, pero hoy un año después funciona a la perfección y esta cómo nuevo me gusta mucho.
